Taxon name.Name: Naganishia albida

Other culture collection numbers: ATCC 10666; CBS 142; CCRC 21672; DBVPG 6110; IFO 0378; IP 28.65; JCM 2334; MUCL 30400; NCYC 445; NRRL Y-1400; VKM Y-2223
Restrictions on use: for commercial development a special agreement is requested
Nagoya protocol restrictions and complia: no known restrictions under the Nagoya protocol
Applications: deacylation of benzyl- and phenoxymethyl penicillin tetrazoles (U.S. Pat. 3,905,868), produces propane (Agric. Biol. Chem. 48: 1679-1682, 1984) and xylan-hydrolase (Folia Microbiol. 23: 336-371, 1978)
